body: Used for ceremonial displays or occasionally worn (albeit with no additional benefit) over heavier armor, these robes consist of several layers of cloth and an outer layer of silk intricately woven with gold brocade designs and covered with metal studs.
name: Silken Ceremonial Armor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Eastern Armor and Weapons/Eastern Armor/Silken Ceremonial Armor
